explains: n. 合并；公司，团体组织
wordGroup: articles of incorporation 公司章程；公司条例
certificate of incorporation 公司注册证；公司登记执照；法人认可证
place of incorporation 公司注册地

sentences.en: Signing a pre-incorporation contract is a universal phenomenon before the establishment of a corporation.
sentences.cn: 在公司成立之前，签署公司成立前合同是普遍现象。

sentences.en: So maybe you should defer incorporation until you are close to raising money.
sentences.cn: 因此，大概你可以推迟注册公司，直到筹到资金为止。

sentences.en: The incorporation of touch screens into portable devices is one driver of this growth.
sentences.cn: 把触摸屏集成到便携式设备是增长的动因之一。
